title: 619: MAX KEISER DOUBLES DOWN ON $220K BITCOIN PRICE PREDICTION BY YEAR-END!! BTC STILL ON TRACK TO 6X!!
description:
Bitcoin advocate Max Keiser, says his BTC price target for this year remains at $220,000, despite the FUD that has crept in over the past couple of weeks.

On that, Keiser added that volatile downswings in Bitcoin are part and parcel of its nature. But on higher time frames and over its 10+ year history, it has still provided 200% annualized gains.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
